siteMetadata.title: Artem Demo, indie developer
siteMetadata.description: Blog about web development, indie GameDev

node.excerpt: It’s not that hard to use graphql with go, but it could take some effort to find all the gotchas. Therefore let’s save some time and talk about some configuration of graphql in Golang. In this tutorial I’ll use graphql-go/graphql library, version v0.7.9
